ThingDef.label: animal skin hardener
ThingDef.description: An animal skin hardener. Releases chemicals and nanomachines that toughen the skin, making it somewhat more resistant to damage.

ThingDef.label: animal venom fangs
ThingDef.description: Animal venom fangs. Injector tubules that are carefully set inside the animal's original teeth, and connected to small sacs of a very powerful venom. Contrary to the human implant, these integrate too much with the animal's teeth and can't be removed afterwards.
